channel.title: How Do I Add Anti-Ban And Anti-Randoms?
channel.description: What are antiban and antrandoms and how would i add them?

item.title: How Do I Add Anti-Ban And Anti-Randoms?
item.dc:creator: @IP-Drowner IP-Drowner
item.description:
@IP-Drowner wrote:

Anti ban are methods used to make your character to not look like you’re autoing. Example, moving the mouse to random corner of the screen, clicking on random game-tabs or by just saying little sentences.

Anti randoms are ways to answer to randoms, such as ScapeRune, Bob the Jagex cat etc. To add randoms, just add FindNormalRandoms to one part of your script.

Read full topic
item.source: How Do I Add Anti-Ban And Anti-Randoms?

item.title: How Do I Add Anti-Ban And Anti-Randoms?
item.dc:creator: @junkj junkj
item.description:
@junkj wrote:

Anti ban and Anti randoms are 2 different things…

Anti ban is adding procedures to make it look like your not a macro-er but to look like a real person Ex. autotalking,taking a break and Anti randoms goes with anti ban too.

Anti randoms are procedures to help you solve anti randoms so it doesnt log out and not solving the random.

So in total there both procedures.

Read full topic
